text: ARaly 7ch4 RTHNf qiferabrot (73d5 9Raev & TTHrf +A4, YRG TRTFR) National Highways Authority of India 4ra T (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 0-5 & 6, 7ae7-10, #RqT, 7f fcrlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 THI/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Conciliation Committee/2023 Policy Circular No.2.1.65/ 2023 dated December 2023 (Decision taken on e-office file no. NHAI/CMD/conciliation/2021-Part(1) Comp. no 67745) Sub: 3 CGMs committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs. reg: Four Nos of 3-CGM committees were constituted vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 2.1.56/2022 dated 18.11.2022 and Policy Circular No. 2.1.58/2023 dated 15.05.2023 to expedite the disposal of pending cases. 2_ Now, it has been decided that Sh. Ashish Kumar  Singh, CGM(F) will replace Sh. Sanjay Verma, Ex-GM(F) [repatriated vide NHAI office order dated 13.11.2023] in Committee No. 3 for all ongoing and future cases of these committees till further orders: 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. oul- (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site 3. Web Admin for circulation_ 9T T 7 9 NHAI New 04th 12/22 Copy
